ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.2_0: Venerable Upananda the Sakyan was sleeping on a high bed.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.3_0: On one occasion, as the Buddha and a number of monks were walking about the dwellings, they came to Upananda’s dwelling.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.6_0: “Sir, please come and see my bed.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.7_0: The Buddha turned around on the spot and addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.8_0: “A fool, monks, can be recognized by his sleeping place.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.9_0: After criticizing Upananda in many ways for being difficult to support ... the Buddha said,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.10_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.11.1_0: ‘If a monk is having a new bed or bench made, it is to have legs eight standard fingerbreadths long below the lowest frame.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.11.1_1: If one uses them beyond that, one commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.2_0: newly made is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.4_0: there are four kinds of beds: one with legs and frame, called _masāraka_; one with legs and frame, called _bundikābaddha_; one with crooked legs; one with detachable legs.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.6_0: there are four kinds of benches: one with legs and frame, called _masāraka_; one with legs and frame, called _bundikābaddha_; one with crooked legs; one with detachable legs.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.8_0: is making or is having made.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.9_0: It is to have legs eight standard fingerbreadths long below the lowest frame:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.11_0: If he makes one, or has one made, that exceeds that, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct. When he obtains it, the legs are to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.12.1_0: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.13_0: If he has others finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.14_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.15_0: If he has others finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.16_0: If he makes one, or has one made, for someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.17_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.2_0: if he makes it the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.3_0: if he makes it less than the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.4_0: if he obtains one made by another that exceeds the right size and then cuts the legs down before using it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.6_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.7_0: The fifth rule, the training rule on beds, is finished.
